description:
Learn how to build Joomla Blogs - for absolute beginners!

This course is a total beginner’s guide to building Joomla Blogs, so you won’t need any prior knowledge or experience with HTML, CSS, or PHP.

Although it is a good idea if you know those languages, that is not required.

Why Should I Learn How to Build Blogs with Joomla?

In simple terms Joomla is one of the most powerful CMS systems in the world and blogs are one of the best ways to drive traffic and market anything you want online.
title: Build Blogs with Joomla
